name: Where and When for Big Fish?

pages.text: For a long time, fishermen have adhered to the principle of $(item)The rougher the waves, the more valuable the fish$(). Through years of experience, they have summarized the following fishing tips:$(br)$(li) Rainy and snowy weather, rare fish increase rate $(item)+ 2.5%%$()$(br)$(li) Thunderstorms, rare fish increase rate $(item)+ 5%%$()

$(li) Nighttime, rare fish increase rate $(item)+ 2.5%%$()$(br)$(li) Skilled fishing rods, each level of Fish Fighter increases the chance of encountering big fish by $(item)+ 1.25%%$()$(br)$(li) Sailing out to sea, rare fish increase rate $(item)+ 1.25%%$()$(br)$(li) On rare occasions, you may encounter a (mutated) shiny fish, worth $(item)5 times$() the price of a regular fish of the same quality.
